text: hi I'm Molly and today we're gonna be
talking about something called
the finger this can also be called the
bird now this is bad you do not want to
use the finger unless you really have to
if you are so angry you can't even use
words all you can do is give someone the
finger and then they know that whatever
they've done is so bad and has made you
really really angry so let's look at two
situations where you might use the
middle finger over here it says I was
cut off in traffic I gave him the bird
now you're driving and you're listening
to music and maybe you have some kids in
the back and someone cuts you off
they drive right in front now that's
dangerous you could have gotten hurt or
someone else could have gotten hurt and
you were just so angry and they can't
hear you through the window so all you
can do is give them the finger and then
they know that you are really angry in
the second situation it says my
boyfriend told me I was fat I gave him
the finger now in this situation someone
has said something to you that is really
mean they have insulted you and they've
hurt you so all you can do is give them
the finger and then they know that
whatever they've done is really bad so
the finger the bird whatever you want to
call it only use this if you are so
angry have a great day
